in test 6 where DEBC_COUNTRY = 'BE' is tested)

17.01.2007 AK SCR12240 change the SQL query to use alpha range instead of numeri
08.08.2006 AK SCR11699 if DEBC_HOFF_CODE_HANDLING empty use CCRY308_OFFICE
05.07.2006 JJ SCR11549 Sql check numeric debtor number only if DEBC_DEBC numeric
20.06.2006 AK SCR11466 use table CLDD only if debtor country = DAY 16
29/11/2005 AK SCR:???? bug fix in Execute SQL command
23/11/2005 AK SCR:9569 change the def user for French speaking Belgium debtors
Only needed for real alpha DEBC_DEBC:
For All French speaking Belgium debtors
END For All French speaking Belgium debtors
8.: Day 16 check (table CLDD - CLIENT DUNNING DAYS)
Search for a numeric value of DEBC:

ExpSyntax.val: 'DEBC_COUNTRY=blank AND DEBH_PADR_COUNTRY=blank AND DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY=BE AND DEBH_LANGUAGE=FR (COFF207_EMPLOYEEINCASSO(ZZ))'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CLDD_ADMNO, CLDD_CLNTNO, concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(CLDD_DEBC_FROM))),trim(CLDD_DEBC_FROM)), concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL))),trim(CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL)), CLDD_USER, CLDD_DAYNO
from :1/CLDD
WHERE CLDD_ADMNO = :2 and CLDD_CLNTNO = :3 and CLDD_DEBC_FROM <>'' and concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(CLDD_DEBC_FROM))),trim(CLDD_DEBC_FROM))<= ':4'and concat(substr('0000000000',1,10-length(trim(CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL))),trim(CLDD_DEBC_UNTIL)) >= ':4'
for fetch only
